document_data.name: Seven Masks Theater
document_data.mainbody: The '''Seven Masks Theater''' was a theater in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] that catered to the masses typically found in the neighborhood. Ship captains and sailors were admitted for free. In the {{YearlinkName|1492}},{{Waterdeep-time}} the owner was a man from [[Shou Lung]] named [[Rongquan Mystere]] but in reality it was the famed rogue [[Jarlaxle]] in disguise.
document_data.Structure: The building was approximately {{SI|105|ft|long=yes}} wide by {{SI|130|ft|long=yes}} deep. The auditorium had a {{SIAdj|20|ft}} ceiling with bare rafters. The lobby, ticket booths, offices, dressing rooms, ''etc.'' had {{SIAdj|10|ft}} ceilings. Passageways between rooms were {{SI|8|ft|long=yes}} high with {{SIAdj|7|ft}} doorways.
